test.title: Biology
test.description: Basic Biology Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) to practice basic Biology quiz answers

questions.question: A relationship in which one animal hunts, kills and eats another
The animal that is hunted and killed for food.
A close relationship between two different species of organisms living together.
A symbiotic relationship in which both species benefit.
Which organelle is found in most plants, some bacteria and some protists?
